concept.title: SM REST API documentation and samples

conbody.p: In the SM GUI, open any application. Then click the ? icon at the top-right corner of the page and select SM API Reference. This opens the swagger API documentation for all SM apps.

This allows you to view expandable SM REST API methods (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE). By clicking the method, you get a full description of the parameters with an automatically generated example. You can test call values and see the response message. This allows you to try each REST API method and get comfortable with it before using it in your code base.
conbody.note: Request and response examples are not available in the PDF version of the Smart Plan Suite SM API Reference.
